text: Paolo Lorenzi was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Dudi Sela won the title after defeating Jan-Lennard Struff 3–6, 6–4, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Canberra Challenger - Singles
title: 2017 Canberra Challenger – Singles
